channel.title: The revised ranger is missing a subclass
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The revised ranger is missing a subclass" - Can someone add the Monster Slayer to the revised ranger?

item.title: The revised ranger is missing a subclass
item.content:encoded:
In general in the archived UA the monster slayer ranger subclass is missing.
Can somebody add it?
I would link the UA but I can't since I don't have enough karma, it's an UA from 2017 called "UA Three Subclasses"
